SEARCH
Package cycling

Class ErrorChecker

java.lang.Object
cycling.ErrorChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ErrorChecker extends Object implements Serializable
The portal does certain things many times, ie check a stage is part of its system. This class holds those functions to avoid repetition.
See Also:
